subject: Layer 3 Validation Result: PortableRalph p4-1 & p4-2

findings.notes: Security audit comprehensive and production ready. 26/26 security tests pass, 0 critical vulnerabilities found. All acceptance criteria fully met.

Code quality infrastructure implemented. Functional requirements met but improvement areas remain: complexity (78.4% pass), documentation (59% pass), naming conventions (68% pass). Acceptable for production with known limitations.

content.summary: p4-1: FULL PASS (production ready). p4-2: CONDITIONAL PASS (acceptable with documented improvements). Both tasks verified with substantial implementation, real commits (70c40f9, a37a1c7), and comprehensive documentation.
content.layer_3_assessment: Independent Layer 3 validation confirms work quality matches Layer 2 assessment. All files exist, commits verified, implementations are substantial not stubs. Recommend APPROVE for completion.
